comment: Professor An does an amazing job with this course! She makes it fun by introducing kids books (some we can't use in a classroom) of different perspectives of well-known historical events. She is so energetic and passionate! She makes social studies fun and exciting even for those that hate the subject. Her content is inspiring and eye-opening too.

Dr. An is AMAZING! She is so kind and such an easy going person. Just one discussion post a week. Easiest class and easiest A! She will also give you some really good resources that you can take with you in the future. Absolutely love her!

Class was SUPER easy. Discussion posts every week, a lesson plan, a group project and an essay. If you miss a discussion post - she will let make it up. If you miss a class - she sends you an email with stuff to do by Sunday night. Really easy & simple.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Dr. An is an amazing professor. She truly cares about student success. Take her if you get the chance to. There is a lot of work in this course so be prepared.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Lecture heavy--Accessible outside class

comment: She is hilarious, caring, & sweet! Lets us out of class early every time. Lots of work- 11 discussion board posts based on readings, film analysis paper, lesson plan, and final project. Easy grader and provides amazing feedback! I love how she is passionate about teaching Social Studies beyond the curriculum- she has inspired me to teach like her.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Lots of homework

comment: Dr An is one of the BEST professors at KSU. I took her last year and still think of all the things that she made us consider as teachers. Don't miss the opportunity to take this class! It can really change your views as a teacher and how you approach teaching certain topics. :)
The class is alot of work, but Dr. An makes it bearable... strong accent, but understandable!! Really nice lady, i dont know anyone that didnt make an A!
Great teacher, easy A honestly... alot of work, but she grades so easy. Everyone gets an A lol :)
I love her, I'm honestly surprised that no one has written on her. I took her for 4403 and she was amazing. A lot of work, but a truly amazing professor and nice lady!!
